content.question:
A description of Charon

1 Portitor has horrendus aquas et flumina servat

terribili squalore Charon, cui plurima mento

canitiescanities, -ei, f.: grey hair inculta iacet, stant lumina flamma,

sordidus ex umeris nodo dependet amictus.

5 Ipse ratem contocontus, -i, m.: pole subigit velisque ministrat

et ferrugineaferrugineus, -a, -um: rust colored subvectat corpora cumba.cumba, -ae: small boat

Aeneid 6.298-303

Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
